preferences.name: hotkey
preferences.title: Keyboard shortcut
preferences.description: Key combination to open the password menu. Can be any function key ('f1', 'f2', etc) or one or more modifiers and a key ('<modifier>-<key>'). Modifiers are: 'shift', 'alt', 'meta', 'control', or 'accel' (accel is Ctrl on Linux/Windows, Cmd on OS X). Examples: 'accel-y' or 'control-alt-shift-p'
